main event: A UFO sighting was reported by military personnel in Alexandria, Virginia on 28 December 1951, describing a generally round object with a hazy inverted truncated cone on top.
interesting points: The object was seen emitting a blue-white soft light and had a diameter of approximately 3 feet., It was reported as moving from stationary to speeds up to 110 knots., Witnesses described the object as having no observed trail, exhaust, or sound., The object's maneuvers included moving SSW, NW, and then SE to N to NW, before disappearing while observers switched fuel tanks., The investigation concluded that the sighting was likely an aircraft with experimental lighting, specifically a helicopter.
sighted object: A generally round object with a hazy inverted truncated cone on top, emitting blue-white soft light.
witness description: Military pilots conducting a routine observation.
